
<table cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0"><tbody><tr><td class="t_f" id="postmessage_52549516">
<i class="pstatus"> 本帖最后由 wfc0101 于 2025-3-8 11:14 编辑 </i><br>
<br>
<font face="AlibabaPuHuiTi, -apple-system, &amp;quot;"><font size="5"><font color="#ff0000">风水，作为中国传统文化的重要组成部分，承载着千百年来人们对自然和生活环境的观察与总结。</font></font></font><br>
<font color="#24292f"><font face="AlibabaPuHuiTi, -apple-system, &amp;quot;"><font size="5">它不仅是一门学问，更是一种生活方式，帮助我们在日常生活中寻求和谐与平衡。</font></font></font><br>
<font color="#24292f"><font face="AlibabaPuHuiTi, -apple-system, &amp;quot;"><font size="5">以下是一些风水的基本常识和实际应用，帮助你更好地理解和运用风水智慧。</font></font></font><img src="https://static.52pojie.cn/static/image/smiley/laohu/laohu33.gif" smilieid="997" border="0" alt=""><img src="https://static.52pojie.cn/static/image/smiley/laohu/laohu33.gif" smilieid="997" border="0" alt=""><img src="https://static.52pojie.cn/static/image/smiley/laohu/laohu33.gif" smilieid="997" border="0" alt=""><br>
<br>
<br>
<img id="aimg_mkKgi" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" file="https://pic2.ziyuan.wang/user/a343235848/2025/03/b9f2a457-1718-480a-90fe-e5c45aac8c4f_1272c739d4298.png" onmouseover="img_onmouseoverfunc(this)" lazyloadthumb="1" border="0" alt="" src="https://pic2.ziyuan.wang/user/a343235848/2025/03/b9f2a457-1718-480a-90fe-e5c45aac8c4f_1272c739d4298.png"><font color="#24292f"><font face="AlibabaPuHuiTi, -apple-system, &amp;quot;"><font size="5"><br>
</font></font></font><br>
<font color="#24292f"><font face="AlibabaPuHuiTi, -apple-system, &amp;quot;"><font size="5"><br>
</font></font></font><br>
<font size="5"><font face="AlibabaPuHuiTi, -apple-system, Noto Sans, Helvetica Neue, Helvetica, Nimbus Sans L, Arial, Liberation Sans, PingFang SC, Hiragino Sans GB, Noto Sans CJK SC, Source Han Sans SC, Source Han Sans CN, Microsoft YaHei, Wenquanyi Micro Hei, WenQuanYi Zen Hei, ST Heiti, SimHei, WenQuanYi Zen Hei Sharp, sans-serif"><font color="#ff0000">一、风水的基本常识</font></font></font><br>
<font face="AlibabaPuHuiTi, -apple-system, Noto Sans, Helvetica Neue, Helvetica, Nimbus Sans L, Arial, Liberation Sans, PingFang SC, Hiragino Sans GB, Noto Sans CJK SC, Source Han Sans SC, Source Han Sans CN, Microsoft YaHei, Wenquanyi Micro Hei, WenQuanYi Zen Hei, ST Heiti, SimHei, WenQuanYi Zen Hei Sharp, sans-serif"><font size="5"><font color="#ff0000"><br>
</font></font></font><font face="AlibabaPuHuiTi, -apple-system, Noto Sans, Helvetica Neue, Helvetica, Nimbus Sans L, Arial, Liberation Sans, PingFang SC, Hiragino Sans GB, Noto Sans CJK SC, Source Han Sans SC, Source Han Sans CN, Microsoft YaHei, Wenquanyi Micro Hei, WenQuanYi Zen Hei, ST Heiti, SimHei, WenQuanYi Zen Hei Sharp, sans-serif"><font color="#ff0000"><font size="5">风水的定义</font></font></font><br>
<font face="AlibabaPuHuiTi, -apple-system, Noto Sans, Helvetica Neue, Helvetica, Nimbus Sans L, Arial, Liberation Sans, PingFang SC, Hiragino Sans GB, Noto Sans CJK SC, Source Han Sans SC, Source Han Sans CN, Microsoft YaHei, Wenquanyi Micro Hei, WenQuanYi Zen Hei, ST Heiti, SimHei, WenQuanYi Zen Hei Sharp, sans-serif"><font color="#24292f"><font size="4">风水，字面意思是“风”和“水”，象征着自然界中的气息与流动。</font></font></font><br>
<font face="AlibabaPuHuiTi, -apple-system, Noto Sans, Helvetica Neue, Helvetica, Nimbus Sans L, Arial, Liberation Sans, PingFang SC, Hiragino Sans GB, Noto Sans CJK SC, Source Han Sans SC, Source Han Sans CN, Microsoft YaHei, Wenquanyi Micro Hei, WenQuanYi Zen Hei, ST Heiti, SimHei, WenQuanYi Zen Hei Sharp, sans-serif"><font color="#24292f"><font size="4">它关注的是环境与人之间的关系，强调“气”的流动对居住者健康、运势的影响。</font></font></font><font face="AlibabaPuHuiTi, -apple-system, Noto Sans, Helvetica Neue, Helvetica, Nimbus Sans L, Arial, Liberation Sans, PingFang SC, Hiragino Sans GB, Noto Sans CJK SC, Source Han Sans SC, Source Han Sans CN, Microsoft YaHei, Wenquanyi Micro Hei, WenQuanYi Zen Hei, ST Heiti, SimHei, WenQuanYi Zen Hei Sharp, sans-serif"><font color="#24292f"><font size="5"><br>
</font></font></font><br>
<font face="AlibabaPuHuiTi, -apple-system, Noto Sans, Helvetica Neue, Helvetica, Nimbus Sans L, Arial, Liberation Sans, PingFang SC, Hiragino Sans GB, Noto Sans CJK SC, Source Han Sans SC, Source Han Sans CN, Microsoft YaHei, Wenquanyi Micro Hei, WenQuanYi Zen Hei, ST Heiti, SimHei, WenQuanYi Zen Hei Sharp, sans-serif"><font color="#24292f"><font size="4"><br>
</font></font></font><br>
<font face="AlibabaPuHuiTi, -apple-system, Noto Sans, Helvetica Neue, Helvetica, Nimbus Sans L, Arial, Liberation Sans, PingFang SC, Hiragino Sans GB, Noto Sans CJK SC, Source Han Sans SC, Source Han Sans CN, Microsoft YaHei, Wenquanyi Micro Hei, WenQuanYi Zen Hei, ST Heiti, SimHei, WenQuanYi Zen Hei Sharp, sans-serif"><font color="#ff0000"><font size="5">阴阳与五行</font></font></font><br>
<font face="AlibabaPuHuiTi, -apple-system, Noto Sans, Helvetica Neue, Helvetica, Nimbus Sans L, Arial, Liberation Sans, PingFang SC, Hiragino Sans GB, Noto Sans CJK SC, Source Han Sans SC, Source Han Sans CN, Microsoft YaHei, Wenquanyi Micro Hei, WenQuanYi Zen Hei, ST Heiti, SimHei, WenQuanYi Zen Hei Sharp, sans-serif"><font color="#24292f"><font size="4">风水学的理论基础源于阴阳五行。阴阳代表对立统一的力量，而五行（金、木、水、火、土）</font></font></font><br>
<font face="AlibabaPuHuiTi, -apple-system, Noto Sans, Helvetica Neue, Helvetica, Nimbus Sans L, Arial, Liberation Sans, PingFang SC, Hiragino Sans GB, Noto Sans CJK SC, Source Han Sans SC, Source Han Sans CN, Microsoft YaHei, Wenquanyi Micro Hei, WenQuanYi Zen Hei, ST Heiti, SimHei, WenQuanYi Zen Hei Sharp, sans-serif"><font color="#24292f"><font size="4">则解释了自然界的变化和相互关系。在风水布局中，平衡阴阳、协调五行是关键。</font></font></font><br>
<font face="AlibabaPuHuiTi, -apple-system, Noto Sans, Helvetica Neue, Helvetica, Nimbus Sans L, Arial, Liberation Sans, PingFang SC, Hiragino Sans GB, Noto Sans CJK SC, Source Han Sans SC, Source Han Sans CN, Microsoft YaHei, Wenquanyi Micro Hei, WenQuanYi Zen Hei, ST Heiti, SimHei, WenQuanYi Zen Hei Sharp, sans-serif"><font size="4"><font color="#24292f"><br>
</font></font></font><img id="aimg_ONa4E" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" file="https://pic2.ziyuan.wang/user/a343235848/2025/03/c87d6d0f-9dfa-4ae9-80b7-a7953ddac20d_61cda9135f4a9.png" onmouseover="img_onmouseoverfunc(this)" lazyloadthumb="1" border="0" alt="" src="https://pic2.ziyuan.wang/user/a343235848/2025/03/c87d6d0f-9dfa-4ae9-80b7-a7953ddac20d_61cda9135f4a9.png"><font face="AlibabaPuHuiTi, -apple-system, Noto Sans, Helvetica Neue, Helvetica, Nimbus Sans L, Arial, Liberation Sans, PingFang SC, Hiragino Sans GB, Noto Sans CJK SC, Source Han Sans SC, Source Han Sans CN, Microsoft YaHei, Wenquanyi Micro Hei, WenQuanYi Zen Hei, ST Heiti, SimHei, WenQuanYi Zen Hei Sharp, sans-serif"><font color="#24292f"><font size="5"><br>
</font></font></font><br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
<font color="#ff0000"><font face="AlibabaPuHuiTi, -apple-system, &amp;quot;"><font size="5">气的流动</font></font></font><br>
<font style="color:rgb(36, 41, 47)"><font face="AlibabaPuHuiTi, -apple-system, &amp;quot"><font size="4">风水强调“气”的流动，良好的气场能让人感到舒适、平和，</font></font></font><br>
<br>
<font size="4"><font face="AlibabaPuHuiTi, -apple-system, Noto Sans, Helvetica Neue, Helvetica, Nimbus Sans L, Arial, Liberation Sans, PingFang SC, Hiragino Sans GB, Noto Sans CJK SC, Source Han Sans SC, Source Han Sans CN, Microsoft YaHei, Wenquanyi Micro Hei, WenQuanYi Zen Hei, ST Heiti, SimHei, WenQuanYi Zen Hei Sharp, sans-serif"><font color="#24292f">反之则可能带来不利影响。</font></font><font color="#24292f"><font face="AlibabaPuHuiTi, -apple-system, &amp;quot;">因此，保持环境的通透与整洁至关重要。</font></font></font><br>
<font size="5"><font face="AlibabaPuHuiTi, -apple-system, Noto Sans, Helvetica Neue, Helvetica, Nimbus Sans L, Arial, Liberation Sans, PingFang SC, Hiragino Sans GB, Noto Sans CJK SC, Source Han Sans SC, Source Han Sans CN, Microsoft YaHei, Wenquanyi Micro Hei, WenQuanYi Zen Hei, ST Heiti, SimHei, WenQuanYi Zen Hei Sharp, sans-serif"><font color="#24292f"><br>
</font></font></font><font color="#ff0000"><font face="AlibabaPuHuiTi, -apple-system, &amp;quot;"><font size="5"><br>
</font></font></font><br>
<font color="#ff0000"><font face="AlibabaPuHuiTi, -apple-system, &amp;quot;"><font size="5">二、风水的实际应用</font></font></font><font face="AlibabaPuHuiTi, -apple-system,"><font size="5"><font color="#ff0000"><br>
</font></font></font><font face="AlibabaPuHuiTi, -apple-system, Noto Sans, Helvetica Neue, Helvetica, Nimbus Sans L, Arial, Liberation Sans, PingFang SC, Hiragino Sans GB, Noto Sans CJK SC, Source Han Sans SC, Source Han Sans CN, Microsoft YaHei, Wenquanyi Micro Hei, WenQuanYi Zen Hei, ST Heiti, SimHei, WenQuanYi Zen Hei Sharp, sans-serif"><font color="#ff0000"><font size="5">住宅选址</font></font></font><br>
<font face="AlibabaPuHuiTi, -apple-system, Noto Sans, Helvetica Neue, Helvetica, Nimbus Sans L, Arial, Liberation Sans, PingFang SC, Hiragino Sans GB, Noto Sans CJK SC, Source Han Sans SC, Source Han Sans CN, Microsoft YaHei, Wenquanyi Micro Hei, WenQuanYi Zen Hei, ST Heiti, SimHei, WenQuanYi Zen Hei Sharp, sans-serif"><font color="#24292f"><font size="4">选择住宅时，地理位置、周围环境至关重要。理想的居所应当背山面水，环境宁静，避免尖角和煞气。</font></font></font><br>
<font face="AlibabaPuHuiTi, -apple-system, Noto Sans, Helvetica Neue, Helvetica, Nimbus Sans L, Arial, Liberation Sans, PingFang SC, Hiragino Sans GB, Noto Sans CJK SC, Source Han Sans SC, Source Han Sans CN, Microsoft YaHei, Wenquanyi Micro Hei, WenQuanYi Zen Hei, ST Heiti, SimHei, WenQuanYi Zen Hei Sharp, sans-serif"><font color="#24292f"><font size="4">观察地形、朝向，以及周围建筑的布局，都是风水选址的重要考虑因素。</font><font size="5"><br>
</font></font></font><br>
<br>
<font face="AlibabaPuHuiTi, -apple-system, Noto Sans, Helvetica Neue, Helvetica, Nimbus Sans L, Arial, Liberation Sans, PingFang SC, Hiragino Sans GB, Noto Sans CJK SC, Source Han Sans SC, Source Han Sans CN, Microsoft YaHei, Wenquanyi Micro Hei, WenQuanYi Zen Hei, ST Heiti, SimHei, WenQuanYi Zen Hei Sharp, sans-serif"><font color="#ff0000"><font size="5">室内布局</font></font></font><br>
<font face="AlibabaPuHuiTi, -apple-system, Noto Sans, Helvetica Neue, Helvetica, Nimbus Sans L, Arial, Liberation Sans, PingFang SC, Hiragino Sans GB, Noto Sans CJK SC, Source Han Sans SC, Source Han Sans CN, Microsoft YaHei, Wenquanyi Micro Hei, WenQuanYi Zen Hei, ST Heiti, SimHei, WenQuanYi Zen Hei Sharp, sans-serif"><font size="4"><font color="#24292f">在室内布局中，家具的摆放、色彩的使用和装饰品的选择都应考虑风水原则。</font></font></font><br>
<font face="AlibabaPuHuiTi, -apple-system, Noto Sans, Helvetica Neue, Helvetica, Nimbus Sans L, Arial, Liberation Sans, PingFang SC, Hiragino Sans GB, Noto Sans CJK SC, Source Han Sans SC, Source Han Sans CN, Microsoft YaHei, Wenquanyi Micro Hei, WenQuanYi Zen Hei, ST Heiti, SimHei, WenQuanYi Zen Hei Sharp, sans-serif"><font size="4"><font color="#24292f">比如，床头宜靠实墙，避免直接对着门口，沙发和座椅的摆放应形成一个和谐的交流氛围。</font></font></font><br>
<font face="AlibabaPuHuiTi, -apple-system, Noto Sans, Helvetica Neue, Helvetica, Nimbus Sans L, Arial, Liberation Sans, PingFang SC, Hiragino Sans GB, Noto Sans CJK SC, Source Han Sans SC, Source Han Sans CN, Microsoft YaHei, Wenquanyi Micro Hei, WenQuanYi Zen Hei, ST Heiti, SimHei, WenQuanYi Zen Hei Sharp, sans-serif"><font size="4"><font color="#24292f"><br>
</font></font></font><img id="aimg_t9488" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" file="https://pic2.ziyuan.wang/user/a343235848/2025/03/33aab593-3645-444a-b2d3-64c8da6dbf99_f14fcf15fb081.png" onmouseover="img_onmouseoverfunc(this)" lazyloadthumb="1" border="0" alt="" src="https://pic2.ziyuan.wang/user/a343235848/2025/03/33aab593-3645-444a-b2d3-64c8da6dbf99_f14fcf15fb081.png"><br>
<br>
<br>
<font face="AlibabaPuHuiTi, -apple-system, Noto Sans, Helvetica Neue, Helvetica, Nimbus Sans L, Arial, Liberation Sans, PingFang SC, Hiragino Sans GB, Noto Sans CJK SC, Source Han Sans SC, Source Han Sans CN, Microsoft YaHei, Wenquanyi Micro Hei, WenQuanYi Zen Hei, ST Heiti, SimHei, WenQuanYi Zen Hei Sharp, sans-serif"><font color="#ff0000"><font size="5">植物与风水</font></font></font><font face="AlibabaPuHuiTi, -apple-system, Noto Sans, Helvetica Neue, Helvetica, Nimbus Sans L, Arial, Liberation Sans, PingFang SC, Hiragino Sans GB, Noto Sans CJK SC, Source Han Sans SC, Source Han Sans CN, Microsoft YaHei, Wenquanyi Micro Hei, WenQuanYi Zen Hei, ST Heiti, SimHei, WenQuanYi Zen Hei Sharp, sans-serif"><font size="4"><font color="#24292f">绿色植物不仅能美化环境，还能改善室内气场。</font></font></font><br>
<font face="AlibabaPuHuiTi, -apple-system, Noto Sans, Helvetica Neue, Helvetica, Nimbus Sans L, Arial, Liberation Sans, PingFang SC, Hiragino Sans GB, Noto Sans CJK SC, Source Han Sans SC, Source Han Sans CN, Microsoft YaHei, Wenquanyi Micro Hei, WenQuanYi Zen Hei, ST Heiti, SimHei, WenQuanYi Zen Hei Sharp, sans-serif"><font size="4"><font color="#24292f">选择适合的植物，如富贵竹、吊兰等，可以增强家中的生气与活力。</font></font></font><br>
<font face="AlibabaPuHuiTi, -apple-system, Noto Sans, Helvetica Neue, Helvetica, Nimbus Sans L, Arial, Liberation Sans, PingFang SC, Hiragino Sans GB, Noto Sans CJK SC, Source Han Sans SC, Source Han Sans CN, Microsoft YaHei, Wenquanyi Micro Hei, WenQuanYi Zen Hei, ST Heiti, SimHei, WenQuanYi Zen Hei Sharp, sans-serif"><font size="4"><font color="#24292f"><br>
</font></font></font><br>
<img id="aimg_JWdw1" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" file="https://pic2.ziyuan.wang/user/a343235848/2025/03/041a755d-92b2-47a1-adf7-59d204068644_a5f7b41646289.png" onmouseover="img_onmouseoverfunc(this)" lazyloadthumb="1" border="0" alt="" src="https://pic2.ziyuan.wang/user/a343235848/2025/03/041a755d-92b2-47a1-adf7-59d204068644_a5f7b41646289.png"><br>
<br>
<br>
<font face="AlibabaPuHuiTi, -apple-system, Noto Sans, Helvetica Neue, Helvetica, Nimbus Sans L, Arial, Liberation Sans, PingFang SC, Hiragino Sans GB, Noto Sans CJK SC, Source Han Sans SC, Source Han Sans CN, Microsoft YaHei, Wenquanyi Micro Hei, WenQuanYi Zen Hei, ST Heiti, SimHei, WenQuanYi Zen Hei Sharp, sans-serif"><font color="#ff0000"><font size="5">风水与健康</font></font></font><font color="#24292f"><font face="AlibabaPuHuiTi, -apple-system, &amp;quot"><font size="4">风水与健康息息相关。保持室内空气流通，避免潮湿和阴暗的角落，有助于提升居住者的身心健康。</font></font></font><br>
<font face="AlibabaPuHuiTi, -apple-system, Noto Sans, Helvetica Neue, Helvetica, Nimbus Sans L, Arial, Liberation Sans, PingFang SC, Hiragino Sans GB, Noto Sans CJK SC, Source Han Sans SC, Source Han Sans CN, Microsoft YaHei, Wenquanyi Micro Hei, WenQuanYi Zen Hei, ST Heiti, SimHei, WenQuanYi Zen Hei Sharp, sans-serif"><font size="4"><font color="#24292f">定期整理和清理空间，避免杂物堆积，也有助于气场的畅通。</font></font></font><br>
<font face="AlibabaPuHuiTi, -apple-system, Noto Sans, Helvetica Neue, Helvetica, Nimbus Sans L, Arial, Liberation Sans, PingFang SC, Hiragino Sans GB, Noto Sans CJK SC, Source Han Sans SC, Source Han Sans CN, Microsoft YaHei, Wenquanyi Micro Hei, WenQuanYi Zen Hei, ST Heiti, SimHei, WenQuanYi Zen Hei Sharp, sans-serif"><font size="4"><font color="#24292f"><br>
</font></font></font><br>
<img id="aimg_K771M" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" file="https://pic2.ziyuan.wang/user/a343235848/2025/03/bfb8e1f8-44ba-40bb-b705-aa26a7c38180_4aa63f1805b98.png" onmouseover="img_onmouseoverfunc(this)" lazyloadthumb="1" border="0" alt="" src="https://pic2.ziyuan.wang/user/a343235848/2025/03/bfb8e1f8-44ba-40bb-b705-aa26a7c38180_4aa63f1805b98.png"><br>
<font face="AlibabaPuHuiTi, -apple-system, Noto Sans, Helvetica Neue, Helvetica, Nimbus Sans L, Arial, Liberation Sans, PingFang SC, Hiragino Sans GB, Noto Sans CJK SC, Source Han Sans SC, Source Han Sans CN, Microsoft YaHei, Wenquanyi Micro Hei, WenQuanYi Zen Hei, ST Heiti, SimHei, WenQuanYi Zen Hei Sharp, sans-serif"><font color="#ff0000"><font size="5"><br>
</font></font></font><br>
<font face="AlibabaPuHuiTi, -apple-system, Noto Sans, Helvetica Neue, Helvetica, Nimbus Sans L, Arial, Liberation Sans, PingFang SC, Hiragino Sans GB, Noto Sans CJK SC, Source Han Sans SC, Source Han Sans CN, Microsoft YaHei, Wenquanyi Micro Hei, WenQuanYi Zen Hei, ST Heiti, SimHei, WenQuanYi Zen Hei Sharp, sans-serif"><font color="#ff0000"><font size="5">风水与事业</font></font></font><br>
<font face="AlibabaPuHuiTi, -apple-system, Noto Sans, Helvetica Neue, Helvetica, Nimbus Sans L, Arial, Liberation Sans, PingFang SC, Hiragino Sans GB, Noto Sans CJK SC, Source Han Sans SC, Source Han Sans CN, Microsoft YaHei, Wenquanyi Micro Hei, WenQuanYi Zen Hei, ST Heiti, SimHei, WenQuanYi Zen Hei Sharp, sans-serif"><font size="4"><font color="#24292f">在办公室和工作环境中，良好的风水布局能提升工作效率与人际关系。</font></font></font><br>
<font face="AlibabaPuHuiTi, -apple-system, Noto Sans, Helvetica Neue, Helvetica, Nimbus Sans L, Arial, Liberation Sans, PingFang SC, Hiragino Sans GB, Noto Sans CJK SC, Source Han Sans SC, Source Han Sans CN, Microsoft YaHei, Wenquanyi Micro Hei, WenQuanYi Zen Hei, ST Heiti, SimHei, WenQuanYi Zen Hei Sharp, sans-serif"><font size="4"><font color="#24292f">选择合适的办公桌位置，避免背后有窗户，尽量让自己处于“坐镇”的位置，以增强自信心和掌控感。</font></font></font><br>
<br>
<font face="AlibabaPuHuiTi, -apple-system, Noto Sans, Helvetica Neue, Helvetica, Nimbus Sans L, Arial, Liberation Sans, PingFang SC, Hiragino Sans GB, Noto Sans CJK SC, Source Han Sans SC, Source Han Sans CN, Microsoft YaHei, Wenquanyi Micro Hei, WenQuanYi Zen Hei, ST Heiti, SimHei, WenQuanYi Zen Hei Sharp, sans-serif"><font size="4"><font color="#24292f"><br>
</font></font></font><br>
<font face="AlibabaPuHuiTi, -apple-system, Noto Sans, Helvetica Neue, Helvetica, Nimbus Sans L, Arial, Liberation Sans, PingFang SC, Hiragino Sans GB, Noto Sans CJK SC, Source Han Sans SC, Source Han Sans CN, Microsoft YaHei, Wenquanyi Micro Hei, WenQuanYi Zen Hei, ST Heiti, SimHei, WenQuanYi Zen Hei Sharp, sans-serif"><font size="4"><font color="#24292f"><br>
</font></font></font><br>
<font face="AlibabaPuHuiTi, -apple-system, Noto Sans, Helvetica Neue, Helvetica, Nimbus Sans L, Arial, Liberation Sans, PingFang SC, Hiragino Sans GB, Noto Sans CJK SC, Source Han Sans SC, Source Han Sans CN, Microsoft YaHei, Wenquanyi Micro Hei, WenQuanYi Zen Hei, ST Heiti, SimHei, WenQuanYi Zen Hei Sharp, sans-serif"><font size="4"><font color="#24292f">-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------</font></font></font><br>
<font face="AlibabaPuHuiTi, -apple-system, Noto Sans, Helvetica Neue, Helvetica, Nimbus Sans L, Arial, Liberation Sans, PingFang SC, Hiragino Sans GB, Noto Sans CJK SC, Source Han Sans SC, Source Han Sans CN, Microsoft YaHei, Wenquanyi Micro Hei, WenQuanYi Zen Hei, ST Heiti, SimHei, WenQuanYi Zen Hei Sharp, sans-serif"><font size="4"><font color="#24292f"><br>
</font></font></font><br>
<br>
<font size="4"><font face="AlibabaPuHuiTi, -apple-system, Noto Sans, Helvetica Neue, Helvetica, Nimbus Sans L, Arial, Liberation Sans, PingFang SC, Hiragino Sans GB, Noto Sans CJK SC, Source Han Sans SC, Source Han Sans CN, Microsoft YaHei, Wenquanyi Micro Hei, WenQuanYi Zen Hei, ST Heiti, SimHei, WenQuanYi Zen Hei Sharp, sans-serif"><font color="#ff0000"><strong>百度通道：</strong></font></font></font><font face="AlibabaPuHuiTi, -apple-system, Noto Sans, Helvetica Neue, Helvetica, Nimbus Sans L, Arial, Liberation Sans, PingFang SC, Hiragino Sans GB, Noto Sans CJK SC, Source Han Sans SC, Source Han Sans CN, Microsoft YaHei, Wenquanyi Micro Hei, WenQuanYi Zen Hei, ST Heiti, SimHei, WenQuanYi Zen Hei Sharp, sans-serif"><font size="4"><font color="#000000"><strong> 風水的常識與應用</strong></font></font></font><font size="4"><font face="AlibabaPuHuiTi, -apple-system, Noto Sans, Helvetica Neue, Helvetica, Nimbus Sans L, Arial, Liberation Sans, PingFang SC, Hiragino Sans GB, Noto Sans CJK SC, Source Han Sans SC, Source Han Sans CN, Microsoft YaHei, Wenquanyi Micro Hei, WenQuanYi Zen Hei, ST Heiti, SimHei, WenQuanYi Zen Hei Sharp, sans-serif"><font color="#000000"><strong>链接: </strong></font></font><a rel="nofollow noopener" href="https://pan.baidu.com/s/1q6-m1WVG4CkqbN2khL1RbQ?pwd=u31q" target="_blank">https://pan.baidu.com/s/1q6-m1WVG4CkqbN2khL1RbQ?pwd=u31q</a><font face="AlibabaPuHuiTi, -apple-system, Noto Sans, Helvetica Neue, Helvetica, Nimbus Sans L, Arial, Liberation Sans, PingFang SC, Hiragino Sans GB, Noto Sans CJK SC, Source Han Sans SC, Source Han Sans CN, Microsoft YaHei, Wenquanyi Micro Hei, WenQuanYi Zen Hei, ST Heiti, SimHei, WenQuanYi Zen Hei Sharp, sans-serif"><font color="#000000"><strong> 提取码: u31q </strong></font></font></font><br>

<br>
<font size="4"><font face="AlibabaPuHuiTi, -apple-system, Noto Sans, Helvetica Neue, Helvetica, Nimbus Sans L, Arial, Liberation Sans, PingFang SC, Hiragino Sans GB, Noto Sans CJK SC, Source Han Sans SC, Source Han Sans CN, Microsoft YaHei, Wenquanyi Micro Hei, WenQuanYi Zen Hei, ST Heiti, SimHei, WenQuanYi Zen Hei Sharp, sans-serif"><font color="#ff0000"><strong>夸克通道：</strong></font></font><font face="AlibabaPuHuiTi, -apple-system, Noto Sans, Helvetica Neue, Helvetica, Nimbus Sans L, Arial, Liberation Sans, PingFang SC, Hiragino Sans GB, Noto Sans CJK SC, Source Han Sans SC, Source Han Sans CN, Microsoft YaHei, Wenquanyi Micro Hei, WenQuanYi Zen Hei, ST Heiti, SimHei, WenQuanYi Zen Hei Sharp, sans-serif"><font color="#000000"><strong>「 風水的常識與應用 」链接：</strong></font></font>https://pan.quark.cn/s/4a217275840b</font><br>

<br>
<br>
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------<br>
<br>
<br>
<font face="AlibabaPuHuiTi, -apple-system, &amp;quot;"><font size="5"><font color="#ff0000">风水作为一种古老的智慧，虽然源于传统，但在现代社会依然具有重要的指导意义。</font></font></font><br>
<font color="#24292f"><font face="AlibabaPuHuiTi, -apple-system, &amp;quot;"><font size="5">通过了解和应用风水的基本常识，我们可以在日常生活中创造出更和谐、舒适的环境。</font></font></font><br>
<font color="#24292f"><font face="AlibabaPuHuiTi, -apple-system, &amp;quot;"><font size="5">无论是在家中还是在工作场所，风水都可以成为我们追求美好生活的有力工具。</font></font></font><img src="https://static.52pojie.cn/static/image/smiley/laohu/laohu28.gif" smilieid="991" border="0" alt=""><br>
<font color="#24292f"><font face="AlibabaPuHuiTi, -apple-system, &amp;quot;"><font size="5">希望大家能在生活中灵活运用这些风水知识，提升生活质量，享受和谐与幸福的每一天！</font></font></font><br>
<br>
</td></tr></tbody></table>
